text:
Wanted an authentic Italian restaurant for supper and I was not disappointed.

Had the grilled octopus as an appetizer, cooked very well, not over cooked and te sauce was good. Only one issue, forgot to season the octopus. No salt, no pepper on the octopus.

As a main course I had the seafood pasta, super good. Pasta cooked to perfection, al dente!  Two giant shrimps, good sized mussels, and good sauce.

Would eat here here again for sure.

Une décision de dernière minute.....Un vrai délice !!!!  
Une entrée de calmars que nous avons partagé. 
En plat principal, pour moi ce fût un Rigatoni avec polpettes de veau, mon conjoint a choisi les Penne Alla Romanof.  Les pâtes étaient cuites parfaitement, la sauce savoureuse en plus d'être servi bien chaud. Bref, ce fût parfait:)
Le service offert par un personnel souriant fût discret et professionnel.
Merci Bravi !!
Il est certain que nous y retournerons.
Carole

Best restaurant ever! Food incredible, best wines and service that makes you feel welcome. 
For special attention ask for Sandro.

Family and food are one of  life's blessings. One of the best authentic Italian restaurant. Our server was just wonderful, made sure we were taken care of. My appetizer was a Insalata Brie with sun dried tomatoes. My main dish was foie Veau in a Porto sauce topped with toasted pine nuts and raisins....Succulent! Vegetables and Spaghetti pasta on the side.. Tea and tiramisu was the last detail  of the evening! My palette was bursting with happiness. Definitely a returning place! $$$

Veal Picatta is fantastic!  
Had cheese appetizer with tomatoes and toast - excellent!
Wine selection is fabulous. 
Service is the best! 
Nice atmosphere.
Probably the best Italian food you can get on the South Shore. Brilliant.

Fidèle a son habitude, le service est sans faille, les pâtes sont al dente tel on en mangerait à Rome.  Les escalopes de veau sont succulentes, de même que le gâteau Ferrero Rocher.  Seul ombre au tableau, la pieuvre grillée était un peu sèche.
Première et dernière visite à ce resto. Pizza bonne mais sans plus. Pâtes à la sauce rosée non goûteuses manquant de saveur. À 22 $ l'assiette, c'est un peu prétentieux...
